title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: March 07, 2023, 01:06:35 PMLast edit: May 01, 2023, 04:49:43 AM by julerz12
content: Binity's bounty campaign will end at WEEK 1. The team has decided to close the campaign and will have 1 week worth of bounty pool.I will finalize the spreadsheet and send the final list to the team for them to process the rewards.Bitnity team announcement: https://twitter.com/bitnity/status/1635944969327497217*SIGNATURES CAN NOW BE REMOVED.EDIT 3/17/23The Final List of bounty campaign participants eligible for the bounty rewards have been forwarded to the Bitnity Team.EDIT 5/1/23Despite several attempts to contact the Bitnity Team and ask about the bounty rewards for this bounty campaign, they refuse to respond and distribute the rewards.Zero responses were made by the Bitnity Team since March 31, up to this day [5/1/2023] despite getting contacted through their Bitcointalk account and telegram. The Bitnity Team seems to have no intentions of sending out the rewards.A negative trust rating is left to their Bitcointalk account to reflect this despicable act.Avatarhttps://imgur.com/SyDx7J5https://postimg.cc/18TCStB3Personal
